name: European Chamber of Commerce of the Philippines
goal: The ECCP is a bilateral foreign chamber that promotes European interests in the Philippines and vice versa. With nearly 800 members, the ECCP offers a strong business network that holds great potential in translating to tangible business opportunities. It is a unique organisation that offers membership as well as professional business services to members and clients.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Customs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
European Economic Diplomacy
EU-Generalised Scheme of Preferences +
EU Free Trade Agreements
EU Development Aid programs
